title: Transfer All Address Book Contacts
content:
I would like to share all my contacts in my Address book. When I click on Export, Thunderbird exports my profile and address book into one file. This file is unreadable by others. All I want to do is share all my contacts.

Darryl
creator: dcady

title: CAN NOT FIND FOLDER AND MAIL
content: 수신한 메일을 폴더로 옮기는 중,에러가 발생하여 다른 폴더와 함께 메일이 없어졌습니다,해당 폴더에 보관된 메일들은 수신한 이력은 남아 있으나 메일 내용 확인이 불가능합니다 사라진 폴더는 메일시스템에서 찾아볼수 없습니다 어떻게 해결해야 할까요?
creator: seunghuii299

title: Block certain websites
content: Is it possible to block certain email address and other websites to prevent incessant junk mail.
creator: bulldogs2012

title: Cannot move new email account inbox
content: Hi, thanks in advance! I have several email addresses set up in Thunderbird. The incoming emails for all come into the global inbox with each having its own folder within that inbox. Today, I added a new email account and the folders for this account, including the inbox, are all in a separate folder. I cannot move the inbox up so it's in that global inbox with all of the others. I've searched for answers, but can't find one that works.
creator: chrisfallsupward

title: Mac: Add "Services" context menu when composing new mail
content:
macOS allows applications to register their entries to the "Services" menu, that appears with right-click on items in the Finder but also in applications where you can write text. I need that menu in the text field where you compose a new email. Is that possible to activate?

My workaround is now to write the text somewhere else where the menu is available, apply it and then copy-paste the result.
creator: mozilla446

title: Save Thunderbird settings
content:
I have installed the latest version of Thunderbird. I have adjusted the settings . Everything looks fine, but how do I save those settings so they are applied next time I open Thunderbird?

I am using Windows 10. I want to save Table View and Descending Sort Order.
creator: flank1

title: TB128  : filename additional information (tags, forwarded etc) for every (IMAP-) email-message
content:
Hi,

I remember from the past, the existence of a file (with a strange name) which contained additional information (tags, forwarded etc) for every (IMAP-) email-message.

Problem is, I can't find it any more, and (stupid me) I forgot it's name and where it's located.

Could someone please

  • help my memory with the name and where it's (or was) located
  • AND when it has been replaced in TB128 by something else, what that something is and where it's located

Thank you
creator: wquatan

title: Bericht opstellen thunderbird
content: In windows 11 helemaal up to date , In thunderbird komt er geen reactie bij het klikken op de knop " nieuw bericht". De fout blijft aanwezig na het verwijderen van de app via windows 11 / instellingen / apps , de nieuwste versie van thunderbird downloaden en terug installeren. Iemand een oplossing ?
creator: fordje3
